DDC.description: DDC plugin - even better format results with Data::Dumper::Concise

DDS.description: DDS plugin - better format results with Data::Dump::Streamer

INC_completion.description: INC completion driver - tab complete module names in use and require

Interrupt.description: Interrupt plugin - traps SIGINT to kill long-running lines

Keywords_completion.description: Keywords completion driver - tab complete Perl keywords and operators

LexEnv.description: LexEnv plugin - variables declared with "my" persist between statements

MultiLine.description: MultiLine::PPI plugin - continue reading lines until all blocks are closed

Nopaste.description: Nopaste plugin - upload a session's input and output to a Pastebin

PPI.description: PPI plugin - PPI dumping of Perl code

Refresh.description: Refresh plugin - automatically reload libraries with Module::Refresh

run: bash -c "test -e .ackrc && grep -q -- '--ignore-dir=.latest' .ackrc || echo '--ignore-dir=.latest' >> .ackrc; if [[ `dirname '%d'` != .build ]]; then test -e .ackrc && grep -q -- '--ignore-dir=%d' .ackrc || echo '--ignore-dir=%d' >> .ackrc; fi"
